body_html:
intrinsics_port.h is there because vs2015 does not implement all intrinsics.
but vs2017 does have them. So maybe something like
#if _MSC_VER < 1910
in intrinsics_port.h will make both vs2015 and vs2017 work.
body_text:
intrinsics_port.h is there because vs2015 does not implement all intrinsics.
but vs2017 does have them. So maybe something like
#if _MSC_VER < 1910
in intrinsics_port.h will make both vs2015 and vs2017 work.
body:
intrinsics_port.h is there because vs2015 does not implement all intrinsics.
but vs2017 does have them. So maybe something like
#if _MSC_VER < 1910
in intrinsics_port.h will make both vs2015 and vs2017 work.
